::Zardus/DeathStorm/FZ/DevilDuer::

Zardus lands in the alliance base shortly before DeathStorm, FZ, and 
DevilDuer arrive.

"He was mumbling something before he went into Stasis lock," 
DeathStorm says, reffering to Wolfgang, "Said something about him 
being a co-leader and controll."

Zardus nods again. "Take his weapons and put him in a CR chamber. I 
have some questions I want answered..." He says to Nemesis and walks 
off toward the bridge.
